ComicInfo.Summary:
Cassidy leads the final showdown between the rebels and the Japanese Imperial Army. As the secret weapon the Japanese have been working on is finally uncovered, our heroes find themselves in a dilemma that they cannot possibly escape. Don't miss the thrilling conclusion to Zenescope's B.A.R. Maid!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano & Wes Hartman | 2 | C | Cover C | Franchesco! | 3 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Franchesco! | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Franchesco! | 5 | Note: The digital edition (4/30/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 14:47:46. [CVDB451887]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Franchesco!, Ivan Nunes, Pasquale Qualano, Wes Hartman
